BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-AddMissingAtoms
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: This bundle uses the PDBFixer package from Peter Eastman and Stanford University, https://github.com/pandegroup/pdbfixer, to add missing atoms for molecular dynamics.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: addmissingatoms :: Molecular structure :: Add missing atoms
